title: R1H3?S Hide And Seek
briefDescription: A nether themed hide and seek map (this is my first map so please do not make fun of it) pls report some bugs so ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
A nether themed hide and seek map (this is my first map so please do not make fun of it) pls report some bugs so i can fix them
Hi there this is my first ever mcbe map to work on well it?s because I have a lot of time to work with now that it?s quarantine time.
THIS IS A NETHER THEMED HIDE AND SEEK MAP WHERE YOU CAN HAVE FUN PLAYING WITH OTHERS
NOTE:DO NOT PRESS THE START BUTTON WITHOUT FRIENDS OR THE MAP WILL GLITCH
RULES
DO NOT BREAK ANY BLOCK ON THE MAP
DO NOT CHEAT OR USE COMMAND
MUST ONLY PLAY AT GAMEMODE ADVENTURE
MUST ONLY HIT THE START BUTTON AFTER ALL THE PLAYERS ARE JOINED
HOW TO PLAY??
START BY PRESSING THE START BUTTON
ONE OF THE PLAYERS ARE RANDOMLY PICKED TO BE THE SEEKER
SEEKER:
HAVE 5 MINUTES TO FIND ALL THE HIDERS, IF THE SEEKER FINDS ALL THE HIDERS BEFORE 5 MINUTES HAVE PASSED, THE SEEKER WON
HIDER:
YOU HAVE 5 MINUTES TO NOT BE CATCH BY THE SEEKER, THERE ARE A LOT OF HIDING AREA LIKE THE TUNNEL ON THE LAVA, HOLES ABOVE THE TREE. IF ONE OF THE HIDER ARE NOT FOUND UNDER 5 MINUITES THEN HIDERS WON
Previews:

new features on the map
-better spawn location
-some parkour for waiting players
-added a bastian but the way to enter is only by going through the hard maze

title: Fan-Made FNAF
briefDescription: StoryYou are a teenager who is in deep need of money, you read an article about a pizzeria hiring for night guards and the payment ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Story
You are a teenager who is in deep need of money, you read an article about a pizzeria hiring for night guards and the payment is jaw-dropping. Little do you know there?s a risk, you could die. You accept that risk, and sign up for the job.
You realise night by night the animatronics get more aggressive. And you finally realise this was a bad idea, but you take the 5th night on the job and pray that you survive.

Besides, you can manipulate PVP and natural regeneration.
There is a more detailed explanation in the game.
Additional tips:

title: National Geographic Hide & Seek
briefDescription: A Hide & Seek Map based on National Geographic. The map contains 5 main areas of Jungle, Desert, Savannah, Antartic and Ocean/Island alongside tunnels connecting the ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
A Hide & Seek Map based on National Geographic. The map contains 5 main areas of Jungle, Desert, Savannah, Antartic and Ocean/Island alongside tunnels connecting the map together for easy travel to escape them pesky seekers.
Hide & Seek is a simple gamemode where one person is a seeker and has to find everybody else on the map. the last person to be caught is the winner.
This map has everything you need to have fun with friends. Every area has multiple hiding spots alongside tunnel systems to make travelling more fun and some secret areas with references to National Geographic.
As a bonus we have built an extra area from the spawn where you can go to learn about the animals featured on the map such as the Black Rhino, the Giant Panda and the Walrus.
Towninator24 ? https://twitter.com/Towninator24
Longlifecheese ? https://twitter.com/HartleyEKaty
Hutchiebros ? https://twitter.com/hutchiebros
When playing for YouTube please tag us in any shares on twitter so we can see how you tackle the Hide & Seek with your friends

title: Simple Spleef
briefDescription: Download this Minecraft map if you like plain simple spleef. This map is a very basic spleef minigames mad with only command blocks. There is ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Download this Minecraft map if you like plain simple spleef. This map is a very basic spleef minigames mad with only command blocks. There is no addons or resource packs required for this map
This world has simple vanilla spleef with just the classic shovels and 2 snow layers.

title: Explosive SkyFight
briefDescription: Explosive Skyfight is with explosives in the sky. It runs only with command blocks and structure blocks. This took about 1 hour of command work, 8 hours ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Explosive Skyfight is with explosives in the sky. It runs only with command blocks and structure blocks. This took about 1 hour of command work, 8 hours of bug fixing, and 3 hours of building. Enjoy and feel free to leave bug reports, ideas on how to improve, and any questions about how to play, how I made it, etc?
Attack your enemies using the TNT, land mines, and fire charges. Escape from certain death with the firework booster.
How to use special items:
use the special items by throwing them on the ground (in item form). Fire charge will turn into a landmine marked by some particles, TNT items will turn into lit TNT, and fireworks will boost you high in the air and hopefully far from danger (fireworks can be activated by throwing or placing)
There are 3 maps included that you can select from the maps menu:
Maps menu^
Ruins^ the post-apocalyptic map which results in the longest, most interesting games
Grid^ a challenging map with lots of parkour from the start

Micro^ a small map for short games
The menu area has a start button that can be used to start games but you can also just jump through the walls of spawn to start

title: Mindustry ? The Industrial Drilling Simulator
briefDescription: Welcome to Mindustry! In this map, you will be tasked with gaining control over a large area of land through the strategic use of drills ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Welcome to Mindustry! In this map, you will be tasked with gaining control over a large area of land through the strategic use of drills to mine resources, powering those drills, and defending them from the oncoming endless horde of power-hungry zombies!
sWelcome to Mindustry! In this map, you will be tasked with gaining control over a large area of land through the strategic use of drills to mine resources, powering those drills, and defending them from the oncoming endless horde of power-hungry zombies!
In Mindustry, you?ll start by placing down a couple iron drills and powering them to begin getting iron. You can sell this iron in the shop to buy land expansions, more types of drills, power cores, defensive towers, and much more. This is a progression / strategy / tower defense type of map in which the main goal is to conquer all the land for your own use in your industrial revolution.
Spawn area
Look of the drills

Ever wanted to play TETRIS on your minecraft?
Now you can play it with this map!
Use controls to move blocks. Click the arrow button to rotate selected blocks. Don?t let the tower get higher!
Actually the reason why I made this map is because when I was on my childhood I saw someone playing this game and during that time I was so amazed on that game and I asked him if I can also try to play is but he won?t let me play it
And now I grow older I still wanted to play that game but I dont have enough time to download and play it so that is the reason why I made this map
I know there are some blocks missing
I?ll try my best to make an update

title: FOOTRACE (Time Trials)
briefDescription: Welcome to FOOTRACE! Despite the name, this is, infact, not a racing map! This map offers 3 (More will be added in the future) different ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Welcome to FOOTRACE! Despite the name, this is, infact, not a racing map! This map offers 3 (More will be added in the future) different tracks with the goal to get the fastest possible time on each!
(Sidenote: Current version: UPDATE 1.02)
In Footrace, as explained above, this is a solo-player time trials map where the goal is to get the fastest time possible on each! This map will be updated will more features and tracks fairly frequently, so if you?re interested, check in often!

STEVE CIRCUIT
GECKO GULCH
MYSTERIOUS MINESHAFT

title: Find the Button: AJ RoCraft
briefDescription: AJ RoCraft presents Find the Button!A short, six-level map. In each level, you must find the hidden button. Levels range from easy to hard. ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
AJ RoCraft presents Find the Button!
A short, six-level map. In each level, you must find the hidden button. Levels range from easy to hard. The final level is the AJ Ring, in which A and J have battled several fights. For more information, check out our YouTube channel.
Each level varies in difficulty, as there are only six levels. We will eventually make a video playing this map. Here are a few pictures:

title: Build Battle!
briefDescription: Build Battle is a fun, chill game where you can test your building skills against your friends! This map can be played with 2-4 people. ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Build Battle is a fun, chill game where you can test your building skills against your friends! This map can be played with 2-4 people. There is solo mode, where you build by yourself. There is also team mode, where you can build with a teammate!
You will be placed in the map and you will be given a theme to build. You will also be given a book which will tell you how to change the floor.
During the voting phase, you will be given 5 voting blocks. Just right-click (or tap and hold if your on mobile) to vote (you must be standing still for it to work).
Enjoy the map!

title: Star Pullers
briefDescription: Star Pullers is a minigame where teams compete to pull a star to their side using a fishing rod. Each team size can consist of 1...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Star Pullers is a minigame where teams compete to pull a star to their side using a fishing rod. Each team size can consist of 1v1, 2v2, and 3v3s. Invite your friends to compete in a easy to play but hard to master minigame!
When you first load into the world, you?ll be greeted with a neat lobby and two options, Team Sizes and Start.
Team Sizes allow you to pick if the team consists of 1 member, 2 members, or a maximum of 3 members.
Start allows you to start the game. It is recommended you pick a team size before starting because it may not work.
Here are some pictures of the lobby:

title: VolleyBall
briefDescription: Have you ever played Volleyball ? Discover now the new game! Hit the ball and do not drop it on your court. Make the most points ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Have you ever played Volleyball ? Discover now the new game! Hit the ball and do not drop it on your court. Make the most points to win the match ! The game can be played up to 2 against 2 and on 3 playgrounds ! Challenge your friends and have fun !
# How to play ?
There are two teams in different fields. The goal is to throw the ball into the other field over the net. If the opponent cannot catch it and it falls to the ground, you win a point. But be careful not to drop the ball on your area! Games are calculated on 6 points.
You can play up to 2 against 2 on 3 ground. There can be a total of 12 players who can play simultaneously !
# Credits
Creator : Startpoul, Instagram, YouTube
Builders : lolichoco19, GnouPetiteLea, Startpoul
Testers : sam0312, xXMariaKawaiiXx, Gofinmassim1
